Package model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Receiver
    responsible for keeping the Dependency Inversion principle
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataHandler
    this class is responsible for storing and managing data
    DepartmentStruct
    this class is responsible for storing and managing a department's respective data
    EmployeeStruct
    this class is responsible for storing and managing an employee's respective data
    GroupChatStruct
    this class is responsible for storing and managing a group chat's respective data
    Log
    this singleton class is for logging to console, as well as to optionally save the log to file
    ModelManager
    this singleton class is responsible for processing instructions from the server and send appropriately formatted requests to the server based on the user's interactions
    PrivateChatStruct
    this class is responsible for extending the group chat (since a private chat can be perceived as a group chat with only 2 people in it) with private chat only methods
